entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
